text: "No Place That Far" is a 1998 song by country singers Sara Evans featuring Vince Gill. It is the title track from her second studio album No Place That Far. It went to number 37 in the United States, number 4 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts and number 1 on the Canadian RPM Country Track charts. It was covered by Westlife. ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Country songs Category:Sara Evans songs Category:Vince Gill songs Category:Westlife songs
title: No Place That Far (song)
